Ingredients.1: 2 (10 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.2: 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained and flaked

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9-inch glass pie dish.

Directions.2: In a mixing bowl, combine soup, tuna, and 1/4 of the potato chips. Mix thoroughly. Pour into the prepared pie dish. Cover the top with remaining potato chips.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until potato chips on top start to brown, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool before serving.
